text: Sárazsadány is a village in Sárospatak District of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County. Its population in 2024 was 236. == Location == It lies 9 kilometres southwest of Sárospatak, between Vámosújfalu and Bodrogolaszi, directly on the banks of the Bodrog. == History == The settlement was formed by the merger of the villages of Bodrogsára and Bodrogzsadány in 1949. == Population == In 2022, 87% of the population identifiedas Hungarian, 3% as Gypsy, 0.9% as German, 6.1% as other non-Hungarian (12.2% did not declare; due to dual identities, the total may be higher than 100%). By religion, 27.8% were Roman Catholic, 10% Reformed, 13.9% Greek Catholic, 1.7% other Christian, 10.4% non- denominational (36.1% did not respond).Sárazsadány Helységnévtár == Notes == Category:Settlements in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County Category:Villages in Hungary
title: Sárazsadány
